text:
SALEM

Shree Parshwanath Jain Trust: Sri Kesariya Swetambar Jain Temple Maha Kumbabishekam, poojas, 9 a.m.; devotional songs concert, Sankar Nagar, 6 p.m.

Public grievances redress meeting, V. Sampath, Collector, presides, collectorate hall, 10 a.m.

Bachelor of Social Service Trust: Awareness campaign for pedestrians, New Bus Stand signal, 10 a.m.

Knowledge Institute of technology: Department of Computer Science and Engineering conducts hands-on-training in IOT Platform, Abdul Samad and Raghav, FICE Education Career Private Limited, Bengaluru, resource persons, 10 a.m

National Book Trust and New Century Book House: National Book Festival book exhibition, Bose Maidan, 9.30 a.m.

Cooptex: New Year and Pongal handloom textiles exhibition, Bose Maidan, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

District administration: Public grievances redress meeting, V. Dakshinamoorthy, Collector, presides, collectorate hall, 10 a.m.

Periyar University and Muthayammal College of Arts and Science, Rasipuram: Campus recruitment by Infosys technologies, college premises, 7.30 a.m.

Department of Handlooms and Textiles: Handloom exhibition, Sri Namagiriamman Thirumana Mandapam, Kulakarai, 9.30 a.m.
title: engagements
